Vamprah::

"Here's Vamprah!!!"said the femme"I'm ready to the spy-mission in 
Maximal city"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (With Yanshosh's self-imposed exile I'm taking over in a dictator-
like state 
> of the Alliance.  Finally, someone with real goals and real plans!  
Hail King 
> Bob---errr me!  I feel like mocking Recess the awesome cartoon, so 
any Recess 
> fans will should look out and shout for the following post)
> 
> Nemesis Enforcer/Scatterblaster/The Oblitercons/Jaws:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Nemesis Enforcer sat upon his throne, or rather Zardus' old one.  
There had 
> been an absence of the top two Alliance members, or rather three.  
Zardus, 
> Wolfgang, and Future Zardus were nowhere to be found.  No one else 
had 
> offered to lead the Alliance, so it was all Nemesis' turn.  As it 
was 
> destined.
> 
> Pressing a few buttons on the armrest of the throne, he had opened 
a comlink 
> on all Alliance radio frequencies, all of them secure and hard, if 
not 
> impossible to crack.  Powerful satellites from the Iron Fist 
broadcasted 
> Nemesis' new orders through Alliance domain and beyond.  From 
Alliance Island 
> off the coast of Spain to the other side of the globe.
> 
> "This is Nemesis Enforcer.  Zardus, Future Zardus, and Wolfgang are 
nowhere 
> to be found and therefore that leaves a window of opportunity for 
the next in 
> line, me.  Some may be thinking 'Wait, I'm more powerful, smart, 
and 
> qualified than Nemeis.' Well my friends, those people are morons 
and great 
> whomping bobula, will die if they mess with me.
> 
> First order of business, revolt and in fighting in the Alliance 
will not be 
> tolerated.  If anyone attempts to overthrow my regime, they will be 
executed 
> painfully.  I have much of the Alliance systems hacked and under my 
control 
> alone.  With the dispersment of the top three Alliance members  the 
Alliance 
> ranks are in chaos."
> 
> "Therefore, all Alliance remembers are now required to radio in 
with their 
> names, locations, and what they are currently doing.  Please be 
prompt."
> 
> ---
> 
> On the other side of the Alliance Island in the salt water, Jaws 
swam idly in 
> his great white shark mode, when receiving a transmission from the 
newly 
> self-appointed leader of the Alliance.   He sent a response.  "This 
is Jaws 
> outside of the Alliance base.  I'm patrolling waters, over."
> 
> ---
> 
> Inside the original Alliance base, the Oblitercons sat idly in the 
mess hall, 
> each receiving the transmission.
> 
> "Dark One and the rest of the Oblitercons here in the Alliance base 
hanging 
> out in the messhall.  What do you want?"
> 
> ======
> 
> "Scatterblaster here, kicking butt in the IGL.  What the slag do 
you want?"
